title: What the BUUUUGSPLAT ?
body:
Literally have been bugsplat in the past 4 days than ever before; Literally loading into game, starting the game, mid-game, victory/defeat screens, honour select, post game. There's not a single time where I haven't been spanked to splat and it's not oh hehe I'll just reconnect just now; it's proper EXCUSE ME, SORRY FOR THE INCONVENIENCE BUT YOUR CLIENT HAS TO REPAIR RIGHHHHT NOWWW! So that happens like 3 times in a row. 

Is this happening to anyone else? It's been happening since last patch and I've sent a ticket in; no response

replies.body:
Try running a **client repair** through settings (the gear icon top right) > Initiate Full Repair.

If that doesn't work try **reinstalling the game** with the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends).

If that still doesn't fix your issue persist with your support ticket (don't submit more than one or reply before they do, it bumps you back to the bottom of the queue), they'll be able to help you more.
